verses.verse: So all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogies;<s%> and <S%H3789>behold,<s%> they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was carried <S%H1540>away<s%> captive to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> for their <S%H4604>disobedience.<s%>

Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> who lived in their <S%H272>possessions<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H5411>Nethinim.<s%>

In <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%>

<S%H5793>Uthai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H566>Imri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
Of the <S%H7888>Shilonites:<s%> <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah:<s%> <S%H3262>Jeuel,<s%> and their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H5543>Sallu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1938>Hodaviah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5574>Hassenuah,<s%>

and <S%H2997>Ibneiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> and <S%H425>Elah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4381>Michri,<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2998>Ibnijah;<s%>

and their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H8337>six.<s%> All these <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
Of the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> and <S%H3080>Jehoiarib,<s%> <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%>

and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%>

and <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashhur,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%> and <S%H4640>Maasai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5717>Adiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3170>Jahzerah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4921>Meshillemith,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer;<s%>

and their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty;<s%> very <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Of the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2815>Hasshub,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5840>Azrikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari;<s%>

and <S%H1230>Bakbakkar,<s%> <S%H2792>Heresh,<s%> and <S%H1559>Galal,<s%> and <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Mica,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%>

and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1559>Galal,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H609>Asa,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H2691>villages<s%> of the <S%H5200>Netophathites.<s%>

The <S%H7778>porters:<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> and <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> and <S%H2929>Talmon,<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman,<s%> and their <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7967>(Shallum<s%> was the <S%H7218>chief<s%>),

who previously served in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4217>eastward:<s%> they were the <S%H7778>porters<s%> for the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

<S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6981>Kore,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H43>Ebiasaph,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H7145>Korahites,<s%> were over the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service,<s%> <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> of the <S%H168>tent:<s%> and their <S%H1>fathers<s%> had been over the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H3996>entry.<s%>
<S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> was <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over them in time <S%H6440>past,<s%> and Yahweh was with <S%H3068>him.<s%>
<S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> was <S%H7778>porter<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

All these who were <S%H1305>chosen<s%> to be <S%H7778>porters<s%> in the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve.<s%> These were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> in their <S%H2691>villages,<s%> <S%H1992>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%> <S%H3245>ordained<s%> in their office of <S%H530>trust.<s%>

So they and their <S%H1121>children<s%> had the oversight of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> by <S%H4931>wards.<s%>
On the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>sides<s%> were the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> <S%H3220>west,<s%> <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H5045>south.<s%>
Their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> in their <S%H2691>villages,<s%> were to <S%H935>come<s%> in every <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> from <S%H6256>time<s%> to time to be with <S%H6256>them:<s%>

for the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1368>chief<s%> <S%H7778>porters,<s%> who were <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> were in an <S%H530>office<s%> of <S%H3957>trust,<s%> and were over the rooms and over the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

They <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> because that <S%H4931>duty<s%> was on <S%H4668>them;<s%> and to them pertained its opening morning by <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

Certain <S%H5921>of<s%> them were in charge <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H935>service;<s%> for by count were these brought in and by count were these taken <S%H3318>out.<s%>

Some of them also were <S%H4487>appointed<s%> over the <S%H3627>furniture,<s%> and over all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and over the fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> and the <S%H1314>spices.<s%>
Some of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7543>prepared<s%> the <S%H4842>confection<s%> of the <S%H1314>spices.<s%>

<S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> one of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> who was the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H7145>Korahite,<s%> had the <S%H530>office<s%> of trust over the things that were <S%H4639>baked<s%> in <S%H2281>pans.<s%>
Some of their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites,<s%> were over the show <S%H3899>bread,<s%> to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> it every <S%H7676>Sabbath.<s%>

These are the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> who lived in the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> and were <S%H6362>free<s%> from other <S%H4399>service;<s%> for they were employed in their work <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night.<s%>

These were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> throughout their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3427>men:<s%> these lived at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
In <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> there <S%H3427>lived<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> whose <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maacah:<s%>
and his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon,<s%> and <S%H6698>Zur,<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> and <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> and <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%>
and <S%H1446>Gedor,<s%> and <S%H283>Ahio,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H4732>Mikloth.<s%>

<S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8043>Shimeam.<s%> They also <S%H3427>lived<s%> with their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> over against their <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

<S%H5369>Ner<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish;<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H4444>Malchishua,<s%> and <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and <S%H792>Eshbaal.<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> was Merib <S%H4807>Baal;<s%> and Merib <S%H4807>Baal<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah:<s%> <S%H6377>Pithon,<s%> and <S%H4429>Melech,<s%> and <S%H8475>Tahrea,<s%> and Ahaz.

<S%H271>Ahaz<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3294>Jarah;<s%> and <S%H3294>Jarah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5964>Alemeth,<s%> and <S%H5820>Azmaveth,<s%> and <S%H2174>Zimri;<s%> and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4162>Moza;<s%>

and <S%H4162>Moza<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1150>Binea;<s%> and <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H682>Azel<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H682>Azel<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are <S%H5840>these:<s%> Azrikam, <S%H1074>Bocheru,<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> and <S%H8187>Sheariah,<s%> and <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> and <S%H2605>Hanan:<s%> these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H682>Azel.<s%>
